game.title: Dragon's Bane
game.objective: Slay the dragon terrorizing the village of Willow Creek.
game.description: The once peaceful village of Willow Creek is now under the constant threat of a ferocious dragon. Slay the beast and bring peace back to the village.
game.reward: 1000 gold, a hero's cloak, and the eternal gratitude of the villagers.

task.objective: Travel to the Dragon's Lair in the mountains.
task.description: The dragon's lair is located in the treacherous mountains east of Willow Creek. Be prepared for a dangerous journey.
The dragon is rumored to have amassed a vast treasure hoard in its lair. Find it and use it to lure the dragon out.
Confront the dragon in its lair and slay it. It will be a fierce battle, so be prepared.

task.objective: Return to Willow Creek and claim your reward.
task.description: Return to Mayor Harold in Willow Creek and collect your reward for slaying the dragon.
